Brazil: At least 56 people are killed in rebellion at Anisio Jobim penitentiary complex in Amazonas state.

Members of the Primeiro Comando da Capital prison gang kill 31 inmates in the Monte Cristo prison in the state of Roraima. This action was revenge for an earlier massacre in a prison in Amazonas that killed 56 inmates.
A police strike leads to a wave of violence and looting in Espírito Santo, including dozens of murders in the state capital, Vitória.
A general strike is held in the country, the first one in twenty years.
